traits.name: Limited Spell Immunity
entries: The golem automatically succeeds on saving throws against spells of 7th level or lower, and the attack rolls of such spells always miss it.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The golem doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Slam
entries: Melee atk +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 27 (4d10 + 5 damage) force damage.

actions.name: Crystal Dart
entries: Ranged atk +10 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. 14 (2d8 + 5 damage) force damage.
